readable.content: A group of children in the ride called " Frog Hopper " . A group of children on the " Frog Hopper " ride at a fair . Five children on a white-metal midair ride called the frog hopper . Five little kids are on a ride called the Frog Hopper . Little kids are on an amusement park ride .
